ViewObject.Name: CandyBOQLinesVO
ViewObject.SelectList: XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.ABSOLUTE_ERROR, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.ACTIVITY_CODE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BILL_QTY, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_LEVEL, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_LINE_ID, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.CANDY_NET_RATE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.CREATED_BY, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.CREATION_DATE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.DESCRIPTION, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.ERROR_DETAILS, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.ERROR_PERCENTAGE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.FINAL_QTY, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.ITEM, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.NET_FINAL_RATE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.NET_RATE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PAGE_ITEM, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PRICE_CODE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.SELLING_AMOUNT, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.SELLING_RATE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.TRADE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.UOM, (select case when XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.FINAL_QTY =0 then 0 else sum(nvl(cost_code_QTY,0)*nvl(cost_code_rate,0))/XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.FINAL_QTY end from xxboq_cost_codes_t where boq_line_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_LINE_ID and bill_page_item is not null and price_code is not null) AS VIEW_ATTR, ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(RES.NET_USEUNIT,0) * nvl(RES.FINAL_RATE,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BOQ_RESOURCES_T RES,XXBOQ_COST_CODES_T CCD WHERE RES.COST_CODE_ID=CCD.COST_CODE_ID AND CCD.BOQ_LINE_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_LINE_ID ) AS TRNAS_NET_FINAL_AMT, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.CANDY_NET_FINAL_AMOUNT, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.NET_FINAL_AMOUNT, ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(RES.NET_USEUNIT,0) * nvl(RES.FINAL_RATE,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BOQ_RESOURCES_T RES, XXBOQ_COST_CODES_T CCD WHERE RES.COST_CODE_ID = CCD.COST_CODE_ID AND CCD.BOQ_HEADER_ID =XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID ) AS VIEW_ATTR, ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N')) AS SELLING_AMOUNT_TOTAL, ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(CANDY_NET_FINAL_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE ITEM IS NOT NULL AND BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID ) AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.LINE_TYPE, (select meaning from xxboq_lookups_t where lookup_type = 'BOQ_LINE_TYPE' and lookup_code = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.LINE_TYPE) AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.APPROVED, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.SUBMITTED, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.ESTIMATED, (select sum(nvl(cost_code_qty,0)*nvl(cost_code_rate,0)) from xxboq_cost_codes_t where boq_line_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_LINE_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID AND ITEM IS NOT NULL and price_code is not null and (line_type = 'M' or approved='Y')) AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_LINE_REMARKS, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.VARIATION_CATEGORY, (select meaning from xxboq_lookups_t where lookup_type = 'VARIATION_CATEGORY' and lookup_code = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.VARIATION_CATEGORY) AS VIEW_ATTR, (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'M') AS VIEW_ATTR, (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and approved='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.ANTICIPATED_VALUE, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.VARIATION_NUM_CLIENT, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.VARIATION_NUM_INTERNAL, (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and submitted='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and approved='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and submitted='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and estimated='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and estimated='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BILL_NUMBER, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BILL_PAGE_ITEM, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.CONTRACT_LINE_ID, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PROJECT_ID, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.TASK_ID, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_rate,0)*nvl(final_qty,0)),0) from XXBOQ_bill_of_qty_LINES_T where BOQ_HEADER_ID=XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and UPLOADED_BOQ_LEVEL is null and bill_page_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N')) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select cl.LINE_NUMBER from okc_k_lines_vl cl where cl.LINE_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.CONTRACT_LINE_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select pj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PROJECT_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select pj.project_number from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PROJECT_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select pt.task_number from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.PROJECT_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.chargeable_flag = 'Y' AND pt.task_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.TASK_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select pt.task_name from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.PROJECT_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.chargeable_flag = 'Y' AND pt.task_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.TASK_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.UPLOADED_BOQ_LEVEL, (select sum(nvl(cc.cost_code_qty,0)*nvl(cc.cost_code_rate,0)) from xxboq_cost_codes_t cc,pjf_rbs_elements rbs where cc.rbs_element_id = rbs.rbs_element_id and rbs.RESOURCE_CLASS_CODE = 'EQUIPMENT' and cc.boq_header_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR

ViewAttribute.Name: TransNetRate
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select case when XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.FINAL_QTY =0 then 0 else sum(nvl(cost_code_QTY,0)*nvl(cost_code_rate,0))/XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.FINAL_QTY end from xxboq_cost_codes_t where boq_line_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_LINE_ID and bill_page_item is not null and price_code is not null)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransNetFinalAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(RES.NET_USEUNIT,0) * nvl(RES.FINAL_RATE,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BOQ_RESOURCES_T RES,XXBOQ_COST_CODES_T CCD WHERE RES.COST_CODE_ID=CCD.COST_CODE_ID AND CCD.BOQ_LINE_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_LINE_ID )

ViewAttribute.Name: TransNetFinalAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(RES.NET_USEUNIT,0) * nvl(RES.FINAL_RATE,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BOQ_RESOURCES_T RES, XXBOQ_COST_CODES_T CCD WHERE RES.COST_CODE_ID = CCD.COST_CODE_ID AND CCD.BOQ_HEADER_ID =XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID )

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSellingAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N'))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCandyNetFinalAmntTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(CANDY_NET_FINAL_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE ITEM IS NOT NULL AND BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID )

ViewAttribute.Name: TransLineType
ViewAttribute.Expression: select meaning from xxboq_lookups_t where lookup_type = 'BOQ_LINE_TYPE' and lookup_code = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.LINE_TYPE

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCostBudgetTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sum(nvl(cost_code_qty,0)*nvl(cost_code_rate,0)) from xxboq_cost_codes_t where boq_line_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_LINE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSumOfRevenueAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: ( SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID AND ITEM IS NOT NULL and price_code is not null and (line_type = 'M' or approved='Y'))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransVariationCategory
ViewAttribute.Expression: select meaning from xxboq_lookups_t where lookup_type = 'VARIATION_CATEGORY' and lookup_code = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.VARIATION_CATEGORY

ViewAttribute.Name: TransMainContractAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'M')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransApprovedVariationsAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and approved='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransVariationSubmittedContractAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and submitted='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransClaimsApprovedContractAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and approved='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransClaimsSubmittedContractAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and submitted='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransVariationEstimatedContractAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and estimated='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransClaimsEstimatedContractAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT,0) ),0) FROM XXBOQ_BILL_OF_QTY_LINES_T WHERE BOQ_HEADER_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and estimated='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTotalFinalAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_rate,0)*nvl(final_qty,0)),0) from XXBOQ_bill_of_qty_LINES_T where BOQ_HEADER_ID=XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID and UPLOADED_BOQ_LEVEL is null and bill_page_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N'))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransContractLineNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select cl.LINE_NUMBER from okc_k_lines_vl cl where cl.LINE_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.CONTRACT_LINE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransProjectName
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PROJECT_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransProjectNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pj.project_number from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PROJECT_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTaskNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pt.task_number from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.PROJECT_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.chargeable_flag = 'Y' AND pt.task_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.TASK_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTaskName
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pt.task_name from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.PROJECT_ID = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.chargeable_flag = 'Y' AND pt.task_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.TASK_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransEquipmentCostBudgetAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sum(nvl(cc.cost_code_qty,0)*nvl(cc.cost_code_rate,0)) from xxboq_cost_codes_t cc,pjf_rbs_elements rbs where cc.rbs_element_id = rbs.rbs_element_id and rbs.RESOURCE_CLASS_CODE = 'EQUIPMENT' and cc.boq_header_id = XxboqBillOfQtyLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID)
